summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The City of Dallas is holding a special called meeting on March 25, 2025, at 11:30 A.M. at the Oak Cliff Municipal Center. The meeting aims to review and make recommendations regarding amendments to specific chapters of the Dallas City Code, focusing on administrative procedures and building regulations.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Call to Order.  
2. Approval of minutes from the previous special meeting on March 5, 2024.  
3. Review and recommendations for amendments to Chapter 52 (Administrative Procedures), Chapter 53 (International Building Code), and Chapter 57 (International Residential Code), including changing the name of Chapter 57 to Dallas One- to Eight-Family Dwelling Code.  
4. Adjournment.

**Important Details**:  
The proposed amendments aim to update the administrative and building codes to reflect current practices and standards. The name change for Chapter 57 indicates a broader scope of regulations for multi-family dwellings.

**Action Items**:  
The meeting seeks approval of the minutes from the previous meeting and recommendations for the proposed amendments to the city code. Participants wishing to speak must register in advance, and the meeting will be accessible via video conference.
